features.title: Setup and Configuration
features.hint: We'll get everything setup for you, and then walk you through our easy-to-use admin panel.

features.title: OS Restore
features.hint: Restore your Windows environment to dissimilar hardware like nothing ever happened.

features.title: Ransomware Prevention
features.hint: Active system monitoring that prevents ransomware from running on your machine.

features.title: Access Anywhere
features.hint: Access, restore, and manage your files and backups from any internet connected computer.

features.title: Workstation
features.hint: Includes Windows, MacOS and Linux workstations.

features.title: Mobile Device
features.hint: Includes Android and iOS device files.

features.title: Server
features.hint: Windows, Linux, SQL Server, Active Directory and Exchange.

features.title: Virtual Machines
features.hint: VMware vShpere, Hyper-V, XenServer, Red Hat Virtualization, Linux KVM and Oracle VM Server

features.title: Office 365 Mailboxes
features.hint: Mailboxes for every user, or individual mailboxes, you decide.

features.title: Website
features.hint: Contact us for more info about our Website-Only backup pricing.

features.title: Proactive Support
features.hint: We handle errors, manage backup configurations and help with restoration.

features.title: Local Backups
features.hint: In addition to storing in our secure cloud, you can host the backups locally.

features.title: Disaster Recovery
features.hint: If your server goes down, we can restore it in our cloud and configure your machines to get back up and running today so you don't have to wait for the tech guy to fix your physical server. *Additional charges may apply.
